mapper.insert: insert into dept(parent_id, name, type, sort, status, create_time) VALUES (#{parentId},#{name},#{type},#{sort},#{status},#{createTime})
mapper.update: update dept set name = #{name},sort = #{sort},status=#{status} where id = #{id}
mapper.delete: delete from dept where id=#{id} or id in (SELECT t3.id FROM ( SELECT *, IF (find_in_set(t1.parent_Id, @p) >0,@p:= concat(@p,',',id),0) AS childId FROM (SELECT id,parent_Id FROM dept t ORDER BY id) t1, (SELECT @p:= #{id} ) t2 ) t3 WHERE childId != 0) ;
